name: 妮科尔·迪金森
name_full: 妮科尔·迪金森 Nicole Dickinson

last_movies.title: 星际迷航：星际舰队学院 第一季
星际迷航：发现号 第四季
星际迷航：发现号 第三季
星际迷航：发现号 第二季

introduction: Nicole Dickinson is a stuntwoman and actress who worked as stunt double for Mary Chieffo in the first and second seasons of Star Trek: Discovery.Additionally, she played several minor and background roles on the series, mostly Klingons or other aliens, wearing prosthetic makeup. She only received credit for four of her roles, when she spoke on screen.Dickinson worked as a stunt performer on Hemlock Grove (starring Famke Janssen, with Emmanuel Kabongo, Wole Daramola, and stunts by Jennifer Murray), 11.22.63 (2016, with Leon Rippy), Killjoys (2016, with Jake Michaels), 12 Monkeys (starring Aaron Stanford and Todd Stashwick, with stunts by Jennifer Murray, developed by Terry Matalas), and Alias Grace (with David Cronenberg and Jonathan Goad, and stunts by Jennifer Murray and Al Vrkljan).
